CustomField.description: It defines if a Member subscribed to a specific Challenge who obtained a Challenge Reward continues participating in the Challenge. If Accomplished Action is "Finished", Members do not continue. If Accomplished Action is "Continue", Members can still participate and obtain other Challenge Rewards. Accomplished Action is "Repeat", Members can still participate and obtain the same Challenge Rewards indefinetely as defined in the Challenge Reward.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: It defines if a Member subscribed to a specific Challenge who obtained a Challenge Reward continues participating in the Challenge.
CustomField.label: Accomplished Action
